form.longName: PhenX PX230103 - Eating Disorders Examination Bariatric Surgery Interview
form.preferredDefinition: The Eating Disorder Examination Â© (EDE) (14th edition) Version 14.3 - Bariatric Surgery Version (EDE-BSV) is a clinical interview assessment of eating disorder psychopathology. The interview includes items related to the respondent behaviors which are potentially indicative of an eating disorder over the past 4 weeks (28 days).

headerInstruction.text: THE CORE INTERVIEW SCHEDULE [Having oriented the subject to the specific time period being assessed, it is best to open the interview by asking a number of introductory questions designed to obtain a general picture of the subject's eating hab..TRUNCATED

module.longName: Eating Disorders Examination - Bariatric Surgery Interview
module.preferredDefinition: Eating Disorders Examination - Bariatric Surgery Interview

question.questionText: What has been your usual eating pattern? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_introduction_eatingpattern)
Have your eating habits varied much from day to day? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_introduction_dailypattern)
Have weekdays differed from weekends? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_introduction_weekvsweekend)

[The definition (and number) of weekdays and weekend days that best fits the patient's lifestyle needs to be established at this point (e.g., check if the subject's days off work regularly fall on weekdays).] (def_wkd_230103)
Have there been any days when you haven't eaten anything? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_introduction_fasting)
What about the previous two months (specify months) ........ Were your eating habits much the same or were they different? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_introduction_history)

How about the three months prior to that ................ that is between (specify month) and (specify month)? What were you eating habits like then? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_introduction_morehistory)
POST SURGERY ONLY PLUGGING (post_surgery_230103)

Over the past four weeks have you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_history)

What is the number of days in 1 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_days_month)

What is the number of episodes in 1 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_episodes_month)

What is the number of days in 2 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_days_monthtwo)

What is the number of episodes in 2 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_episodes_monthtwo)

What is the number of days in 3 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_days_monththree)

What is the number of episodes in 3 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_episodes_monththree)

What is the number of days in 4 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_days_monthfour)

What is the number of episodes in 4 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_episodes_monthfour)

What is the number of days in 5 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_days_monthfive)

What is the number of episodes in 5 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_episodes_monthfive)

What is the number of days in 6 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_days_monthsix)

What is the number of episodes in 6 month prior that you had problems with the small opening in your stomach becoming plugged, or food becoming stuck in the small opening of your stomach? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_episodes_monthsix)
Which foods cause plugging? (select all that apply) (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_food)
Which foods cause plugging? Other (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_food_other)
What situations are associated with plugging? (select all that apply) (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_plugging)
What situations are associated with plugging? Other (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_plugging_other)
Does plugging come as a surprise to you, that is, happen unexpectedly? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging)
How do you react? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_reaction)
How do you react? Other (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_plugging_reaction_other)
DUMPING (dumping_230101)
Over the past four weeks have you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_history)
If yes, if Sigstad clinical diagnostic index total score is greater than or equal to 5, what is the total index score? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_sigstad)
What is the number of days in 1 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_days_prior1month)
What is the number of episodes in 1 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_episodes_prior1month)
What is the number of days in 2 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_days_prior2month)
What is the number of episodes in 2 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_episodes_prior2month)
What is the number of days in 3 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_days_prior3month)
What is the number of episodes in 3 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_episodes_prior3month)
What is the number of days in 4 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_days_prior4month)
What is the number of episodes in 4 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_episodes_prior4month)
What is the number of days in 5 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_days_prior5month)
What is the number of episodes in 5 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_episodes_prior5month)
What is the number of days in 6 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_days_prior6month)
What is the number of episodes in 6 month prior that you had problems with dumping during or up to 3 hours after food intake? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_episodes_prior6month)
What foods cause dumping? (select all that apply) (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_food)
What foods cause dumping? Other (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_food_other)
Does dumping come as a surprise to you, that is, happen unexpectedly? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_surprise)
How do you react? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_reaction)
How do you react? Other (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_reaction_other)

SIGSTAD's CLINICAL DIAGNOSTIC INDEX: Weighting factors allocated to postprandial symptoms and signs of the dumping syndrome. Identify those that usually occur following sweet ingestion. (sigstad_230101)
Which postprandial symptoms and signs of the dumping syndrome does the subject experience following sweet ingestion? Select all that apply (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_symptoms)

validValue.meaningText: +4 - Desire to lie or sit down
validValue.description: +4 - Desire to lie or sit down

validValue.meaningText: +3 - Sleepiness, drowsiness, yawning, apathy, falling asleep
validValue.description: +3 - Sleepiness, drowsiness, yawning, apathy, falling asleep

validValue.meaningText: +1 - Feeling of warmth, sweating, pallor, clammy skin
validValue.description: +1 - Feeling of warmth, sweating, pallor, clammy skin

question.questionText: A clinical diagnostic index of +7 or above indicates dumping Indices of 56 indicates subthreshold dumping and should be rated Indices of + 4 or below indicates nondumping. Eructation and vomiting are weighted negatively in order to distinguish dumping from the afferent loop and small stomach syndromes. (diagnostic_dump_230103)
Does the subject suffer any of these other symptoms? (check all the apply) (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dumping_symptomsother)
EATING HABITS We are interested in possible changes in eating habits before and after you had bariatric surgery. (eat_habit_230103)
In the last 28 days, how would you describe your level of hunger? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_hunger)
How would you describe your appetite? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_appetite)
What are your favorite foods? 1 (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_favoritefood_1)
What are your favorite foods? 2 (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_favoritefood_2)
What are your favorite foods? 3 (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_favoritefood_3)
What are your favorite foods? 4 (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_favoritefood_4)
What are your favorite foods? 5 (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_favoritefood_5)
How would you rate your level of enjoyment while eating? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_enjoyment)
Do you experience cravings for food? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_cravings)
If yes, what foods? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_cravings_foods)
How would you rate the strength of your cravings? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_cravings_strength)
Please rate the following aspects of eating: speed of eating (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_speed)
Please rate the following aspects of eating: importance of eating (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_importance)
Please rate the following aspects of eating: time spent on food preparation (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_preparation)
Please rate the following aspects of eating: time spent chewing (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_chewing)
Please rate the following aspects of eating: other (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_other)
Other aspect (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_eatinghabits_other_string)
PATTERN OF EATING *I would like to ask about your pattern of eating (pattern_eat_230103)

Over the past four weeks (not including today), which of these meals or snacks have you eaten regularly during the week? (check all that apply) (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_patterneating_week)

validValue.meaningText: Nocturnal snack (i.e., after having been asleep)
validValue.description: Nocturnal snack (i.e., after having been asleep)

DIETARY RULES (diet_rules_230103)

Over the past four weeks have you tried to follow certain definite rules regarding your eating for example, a calorie limit, preset quantities of food, or rules about what you should or should not eat or when you should eat? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dietaryrules_history)
Have there been occasions when you have been aware that you have broken a dietary rule that you have set for yourself? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dietaryrules_brokenrule)
What are these rules? How have you felt about breaking them? OR How would you have felt if you had broken one of your rules? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dietaryrules_details)
Why have you tried to follow them? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dietaryrules_reason)
Have they been designed to influence your shape or weight? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dietaryrules_shapeweight)

Have they been definite rules or general principles? Examples of definite rules would be I must not eat eggs" or "I must not eat cake" whereas you could have the general principle "I should try to eat healthy food". (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dietaryrules_definiteorgeneral)

question.questionText: Night Eating Questionnaire (night_eatng_230103)
At what age did your weight first became a problem? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_ageweight)
What has been your heaviest weight? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_heaviestweight)
How hungry are you usually in the morning? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_hungrymorning)
When do you usually eat for the first time? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_firstmeal)
Do you have cravings or urges to eat snacks after supper, but before bedtime? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_aftersupper)
How much control do you have over your eating between supper and bedtime? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_aftersupper_control)
How much of your daily food intake do you consume after suppertime? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_aftersupper_dailyintake)
Are you currently feeling blue or down in the dumps? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_depressed)
When you are feeling blue, is your mood lower in the: (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_depressed_mood)
How often do you have trouble getting to sleep? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_sleeptrouble)
Other than only to use the bathroom, how often do you get up at least once in the middle of the night? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_wakeup)
Do you have cravings or urges to eat snacks when you wake up at night? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_wakeup_cravings)
Do you need to eat in order to get back to sleep when you awake at night? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_eattosleep)
When you get up in the middle of the night, how often do you snack? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_frequency)
When you snack in the middle of the night, how aware are you of your eating? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_awareness)
How much control do you have over your eating while you are up at night? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_control)
How long have your current difficulties with night eating been going on? Months (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_difficulty_months)
How long have your current difficulties with night eating been going on? Years (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_nighteating_difficulty_years)

Has this been to influence your shape or weight? (psychopathologyeatingdisordersbariatric_dietaryrestrictions_shapeweight)

protocol.longName: Eating Disorders Examination - Bariatric Surgery Interview
protocol.preferredDefinition: The Eating Disorder Examination Â© (EDE) (14<sup>th</sup> edition) Version 14.3 - Bariatric Surgery Version (EDE-BSV) is a clinical interview assessment of eating disorder psychopathology. The interview includes items related to the respondent behaviors which are potentially indicative of an eating disorder over the past 4 weeks (28 days).
